actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on January 29, 2024.

actions-list.header: Library of Congress Trust Fund Board
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 1 of the Library of Congress Trust Fund Board Act (2 U.S.C. 154), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed Ms. Cynthia Fisher of Newton, Massachusetts, five-year term.

actions-list.header: Commission on Reform and Modernization of the Department of State
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 9803(d)(1)(C) of the James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 (Public Law No. 117-263), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed Mr. Miller of Ohio and Mr. Marshall Billingslea of Montgomery, Alabama.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Andy Harris to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
